meta.description: Configuration common to all charts.

data.description: The data to render the chart from. If this is not specified, it must be set on individual series instead.

container.description:
The element to place the rendered chart into.
Important: make sure to read the autoSize config description for information on how the container element affects the chart size (by default).

autoSize.description:
By default, the chart will resize automatically to fill the container element. Set this to false to disable this behaviour. If either the width or height are set, auto-sizing will be disabled unless this is explicitly set to true.
Important: if this config is set to true, make sure to give the chart's container element an explicit size, otherwise you will run into a chicken and egg situation where the container expects to size itself according to the content and the chart expects to size itself according to the container.

width.description: The width of the chart in pixels. Has no effect if autoSize is set to true.

height.description: The height of the chart in pixels. Has no effect if autoSize is set to true.

meta.description: Global configuration that applies to all tooltips in the chart.

enabled.description: Set to false to disable tooltips for all series in the chart.

tracking.description: If true, for series with markers the tooltip will be shown to the closest marker.

class.description: A class name to be added to the tooltip element of the chart.

meta.description: Configuration for the padding shown around the chart.

top.description: The number of pixels of padding at the top of the chart area.

right.description: The number of pixels of padding at the right of the chart area.

bottom.description: The number of pixels of padding at the bottom of the chart area.

left.description: The number of pixels of padding at the left of the chart area.

meta.description: Configuration for the background shown behind the chart.

visible.description: Whether or not the background should be visible.

meta.description: Configuration for the title shown at the top of the chart.

enabled.description: Whether or not the title should be shown.

text.description: The text to show in the title.

color.description: The colour to use for the title.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the title.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the title.

fontSize.description: The font size in pixels to use for the title.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the title.

meta.description: Configuration for the subtitle shown beneath the chart title. Note: a subtitle will only be shown if a title is also present.

enabled.description: Whether or not the subtitle should be shown.

text.description: The text to show in the subtitle.

color.description: The colour to use for the subtitle.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the subtitle.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the subtitle.

fontSize.description: The font size in pixels to use for the subtitle.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the subtitle.

meta.description: Configuration for the chart legend.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show the legend.

position.description: Where the legend should show in relation to the chart.

spacing.description: The spacing in pixels to use outside the legend.

layoutHorizontalSpacing.description: The horizontal spacing in pixels to use between legend items.

layoutVerticalSpacing.description: The vertical spacing in pixels to use between legend items.

itemSpacing.description: The spacing in pixels between a legend marker and the corresponding label.

markerShape.description: If set, overrides the marker shape from the series and the legend will show the specified marker shape instead. If not set, will use a marker shape matching the shape from the series, or fall back to 'square' if there is none.

markerSize.description: The size in pixels of the markers in the legend.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the stroke for markers in the legend.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the legend.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the legend.

fontSize.description: The font size in pixels to use for the legend.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the legend.

meta.description: Configuration for the chart navigator. This config is only supported by cartesian charts.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show the navigator.

margin.description: The distance between the navigator and the bottom axis.

min.description: The start of the visible range in the [0, 1] interval.

max.description: The end of the visible range in the [0, 1] interval.

meta.description: Configuration for the navigator's visible range mask.

fill.description: The fill colour used by the mask.

stroke.description: The stroke colour used by the mask.

strokeWidth.description: The stroke width used by the mask.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the mask's fill in the [0, 1] interval, where 0 is effectively no masking.

meta.description: Configuration for the navigator's left handle.

fill.description: The fill colour used by the handle.

stroke.description: The stroke colour used by the handle.

strokeWidth.description: The stroke width used by the handle.

gripLineLength.description: The length of the handle's grip lines.

gripLineGap.description: The distance between the handle's grip lines.

meta.description: Configuration for the navigator's right handle.

fill.description: The fill colour used by the handle.

stroke.description: The stroke colour used by the handle.

strokeWidth.description: The stroke width used by the handle.

gripLineLength.description: The length of the handle's grip lines.

gripLineGap.description: The distance between the handle's grip lines.

meta.description: Configuration for axes in cartesian charts.

position.description: The position on the chart where the axis should be rendered.

min.description: User override for the automatically determinted min value (based on series data). Only applied to "number" axes.

max.description: User override for the automatically determinted max value (based on series data). Only applied to "number" axes.

meta.description: Configuration for the title shown next to the axis.

enabled.description: Whether or not the axis title should be shown.

text.description: The text to show in the axis title.

color.description: The colour to use for the axis title.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the axis title.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the axis title.

fontSize.description: The font size in pixels to use for the axis title.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the axis title.

meta.description: Configuration for the axis line.

width.description: The width in pixels of the axis line.

color.description: The colour of the axis line.

meta.description: Configuration for the axis ticks.

width.description: The width in pixels of the axis ticks (and corresponding grid line).

size.description: The length in pixels of the axis ticks.

color.description: The colour of the axis ticks.

count.description: A hint of how many ticks to use across an axis. The axis is not guaranteed to use exactly this number of ticks, but will try to use a number of ticks that is close to the number given.

meta.description: Configuration for the axis labels, shown next to the ticks.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the labels.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the labels.

fontSize.description: The font size in pixels to use for the labels.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the labels.

color.description: The colour to use for the labels.

padding.description: Padding in pixels between the axis label and the tick.

rotation.description: The rotation of the axis labels in degrees. Note: for integrated charts the default is 335 degrees, unless the axis shows grouped or default categories (indexes). The first row of labels in a grouped category axis is rotated perpendicular to the axis line.

format.description: Format string used when rendering labels for time axes. For more information on the structure of the string, click here.

formatter.description: Function used to render axis labels. If value is a number, fractionDigits will also be provided, which indicates the number of fractional digits used in the step between ticks; for example, a tick step of 0.0005 would have fractionDigits set to 4.

meta.description: Configuration of the lines used to form the grid in the chart area.

stroke.description: The colour of the grid line.

lineDash.description: Defines how the gridlines are rendered. Every number in the array specifies the length in pixels of alternating dashes and gaps. For example, [6, 3] means dashes with a length of 6 pixels with gaps between of 3 pixels.

meta.description: Configuration for bar/column series.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data.

xName.description: A human-readable description of the x-values.

yKeys.description: The keys to use to retrieve y-values from the data.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If this is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether or not to display the series.

showInLegend.description: Whether or not to include the series in the legend.

meta.description: Series-specific tooltip configuration.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

renderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

grouped.description: Whether to show different y-values as separate bars (grouped) or not (stacked).

normalizedTo.description: The number to normalise the bar stacks to. Has no effect when grouped is true. For example, if normalizedTo is set to 100, the bar stacks will all be scaled proportionally so that each of their totals is 100.

fills.description: The colours to cycle through for the fills of the bars.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the fill for the bars.

strokes.description: The colours to cycle through for the strokes of the bars.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the bars.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the stroke for the bars.

meta.description: Configuration for the highlighting used when the bars are hovered over.

fill.description: The fill colour of the bars when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the bars when hovered over.

meta.description: Configuration for the shadow used behind the chart series.

enabled.description: Whether or not the shadow is visible.

xOffset.description: The horizontal offset in pixels for the shadow.

yOffset.description: The vertical offset in pixels for the shadow.

blur.description: The radius of the shadow's blur, given in pixels.

lineDash.description: Defines how the bar/column strokes are rendered. Every number in the array specifies the length in pixels of alternating dashes and gaps. For example, [6, 3] means dashes with a length of 6 pixels with gaps between of 3 pixels.

lineDashOffset.description: The initial offset of the dashed line in pixels.

meta.description: Configuration for the labels shown on bars.

enabled.description: Whether or not the labels should be shown.

color.description: The colour to use for the labels.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the labels.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the labels.

fontSize.description: The font size in pixels to use for the labels.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the labels.

formatter.description: Function used to return formatting for individual bars/columns, based on the given parameters. If the current bar/column is highlighted, the highlighted property will be set to true; make sure to check this if you want to differentiate between the highlighted and un-highlighted states.

meta.description: A map of event names to event listeners.

nodeClick.description: The listener to call when a bar/column node is clicked.

meta.description: Configuration for line series.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data.

xName.description: A human-readable description of the x-values.

yKey.description: The key to use to retrieve y-values from the data.

yName.description: A human-readable description of the y-values.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If this is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether or not to display the series.

showInLegend.description: Whether or not to include the series in the legend.

meta.description: Series-specific tooltip configuration.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

renderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

title.description: The title to use for the series. Defaults to yName if it exists, or yKey if not.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke for the lines.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the lines.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the stroke for the lines.

meta.description: Configuration for the markers used in the series.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show markers.

shape.description: The shape to use for the markers. You can also supply a custom marker by providing a Marker subclass.

size.description: The size in pixels of the markers.

maxSize.description: For series where the size of the marker is determined by the data, this determines the largest size a marker can be in pixels.

fill.description: The colour to use for marker fills. If this is not specified, the markers will take their fill from the series.

stroke.description: The colour to use for marker strokes. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke from the series.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the marker stroke. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke width from the series.

formatter.description: Function used to return formatting for individual markers, based on the supplied information. If the current marker is highlighted, the highlighted property will be set to true; make sure to check this if you want to differentiate between the highlighted and un-highlighted states.

meta.description: Configuration for the highlighting used when the markers are hovered over.

fill.description: The fill colour of the markers when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the markers when hovered over.

lineDash.description: Defines how the line stroke is rendered. Every number in the array specifies the length in pixels of alternating dashes and gaps. For example, [6, 3] means dashes with a length of 6 pixels with gaps between of 3 pixels.

lineDashOffset.description: The initial offset of the dashed line in pixels.

meta.description: A map of event names to event listeners.

nodeClick.description: The listener to call when a line series node (marker) is clicked.

meta.description: Configuration for area series.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data.

xName.description: A human-readable description of the x-values.

yKeys.description: The keys to use to retrieve y-values from the data.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If this is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether or not to display the series.

showInLegend.description: Whether or not to include the series in the legend.

meta.description: Series-specific tooltip configuration.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

renderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

normalizedTo.description: The number to normalise the area stacks to. For example, if normalizedTo is set to 100, the stacks will all be scaled proportionally so that their total height is always 100.

fills.description: The colours to cycle through for the fills of the areas.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the fill for the areas.

strokes.description: The colours to cycle through for the strokes of the areas.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the areas.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the stroke for the areas.

meta.description: Configuration for the markers used in the series.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show markers.

shape.description: The shape to use for the markers. You can also supply a custom marker by providing a Marker subclass.

size.description: The size in pixels of the markers.

maxSize.description: For series where the size of the marker is determined by the data, this determines the largest size a marker can be in pixels.

fill.description: The colour to use for marker fills. If this is not specified, the markers will take their fill from the series.

stroke.description: The colour to use for marker strokes. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke from the series.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the marker stroke. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke width from the series.

formatter.description: Function used to return formatting for individual markers, based on the supplied information. If the current marker is highlighted, the highlighted property will be set to true; make sure to check this if you want to differentiate between the highlighted and un-highlighted states.

meta.description: Configuration for the highlighting used when the markers are hovered over.

fill.description: The fill colour of the markers when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the markers when hovered over.

lineDash.description: Defines how the area strokes are rendered. Every number in the array specifies the length in pixels of alternating dashes and gaps. For example, [6, 3] means dashes with a length of 6 pixels with gaps between of 3 pixels.

lineDashOffset.description: The initial offset of the dashed line in pixels.

meta.description: Configuration for the shadow used behind the chart series.

enabled.description: Whether or not the shadow is visible.

xOffset.description: The horizontal offset in pixels for the shadow.

yOffset.description: The vertical offset in pixels for the shadow.

blur.description: The radius of the shadow's blur, given in pixels.

meta.description: Configuration for scatter/bubble series.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data.

xName.description: A human-readable description of the x-values.

yKey.description: The key to use to retrieve y-values from the data.

yName.description: A human-readable description of the y-values.

sizeKey.description: The key to use to retrieve size values from the data, used to control the size of the markers in bubble charts.

sizeName.description: A human-readable description of the size values.

labelKey.description: The key to use to retrieve values from the data to use as labels for the markers.

labelName.description: A human-readable description of the label values.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If this is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether or not to display the series.

showInLegend.description: Whether or not to include the series in the legend.

meta.description: Series-specific tooltip configuration.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

renderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

title.description: The title to use for the series. Defaults to yName if it exists, or yKey if not.

fill.description: The colour of the fill for the markers.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the fill for the markers.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke for the markers.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the markers.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the stroke for the markers.

meta.description: Configuration for the markers used in the series.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show markers.

shape.description: The shape to use for the markers. You can also supply a custom marker by providing a Marker subclass.

size.description: The size in pixels of the markers.

maxSize.description: For series where the size of the marker is determined by the data, this determines the largest size a marker can be in pixels.

fill.description: The colour to use for marker fills. If this is not specified, the markers will take their fill from the series.

stroke.description: The colour to use for marker strokes. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke from the series.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the marker stroke. If this is not specified, the markers will take their stroke width from the series.

formatter.description: Function used to return formatting for individual markers, based on the supplied information. If the current marker is highlighted, the highlighted property will be set to true; make sure to check this if you want to differentiate between the highlighted and un-highlighted states.

meta.description: Configuration for the highlighting used when the markers are hovered over.

fill.description: The fill colour of the markers when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the markers when hovered over.

meta.description: A map of event names to event listeners.

nodeClick.description: The listener to call when a scatter series node (marker) is clicked.

meta.description: Configuration for pie/doughnut series.

angleKey.description: The key to use to retrieve angle values from the data.

angleName.description: A human-readable description of the angle values.

labelKey.description: The key to use to retrieve label values from the data.

labelName.description: A human-readable description of the label values.

radiusKey.description: The key to use to retrieve radius values from the data.

radiusName.description: A human-readable description of the radius values.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If this is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether or not to display the series.

showInLegend.description: Whether or not to include the series in the legend.

meta.description: Series-specific tooltip configuration.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

renderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

lineDash.description: Defines how the pie sector strokes are rendered. Every number in the array specifies the length in pixels of alternating dashes and gaps. For example, [6, 3] means dashes with a length of 6 pixels with gaps between of 3 pixels.

lineDashOffset.description: The initial offset of the dashed line in pixels.

rotation.description: The rotation of the pie series in degrees.

innerRadiusOffset.description: The offset in pixels of the inner radius of the series. Used to construct doughnut charts. If this is not given, or a value of zero is given, a pie chart will be rendered.

outerRadiusOffset.description: The offset in pixels of the outer radius of the series. Used to construct doughnut charts.

meta.description: Configuration for the series title.

enabled.description: Whether or not the title should be shown.

text.description: The text to show in the title.

color.description: The colour to use for the title.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the title.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the title.

fontSize.description: The font size in pixels to use for the title.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the title.

fills.description: The colours to cycle through for the fills of the segments.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the fill for the segments.

strokes.description: The colours to cycle through for the strokes of the segments.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the segments.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the stroke for the segments.

meta.description: Configuration for the highlighting used when the segments are hovered over.

fill.description: The fill colour of the segments when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the segments when hovered over.

meta.description: Configuration for the labels used for the segments.

enabled.description: Whether or not the labels should be shown.

color.description: The colour to use for the labels.

fontStyle.description: The font style to use for the labels.

fontWeight.description: The font weight to use for the labels.

fontSize.description: The font size in pixels to use for the labels.

fontFamily.description: The font family to use for the labels.

offset.description: Distance in pixels between the callout line and the label text.

minAngle.description: Minimum angle in degrees required for a segment to show a label.

meta.description: Configuration for the callouts used with the labels for the segments.

colors.description: The colours to cycle through for the strokes of the callouts.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the stroke for callout lines.

length.description: The length in pixels of the callout lines.

meta.description: Configuration for the shadow used behind the chart series.

enabled.description: Whether or not the shadow is visible.

xOffset.description: The horizontal offset in pixels for the shadow.

yOffset.description: The vertical offset in pixels for the shadow.

blur.description: The radius of the shadow's blur, given in pixels.

meta.description: A map of event names to event listeners.

nodeClick.description: The listener to call when a pie slice is clicked.

data.description: The data to use when rendering the series. If this is not supplied, data must be set on the chart instead.

visible.description: Whether or not to display the series.

showInLegend.description: Whether or not to include the series in the legend.

meta.description: Series-specific tooltip configuration.

enabled.description: Whether or not to show tooltips when the series are hovered over.

renderer.description: Function used to create the content for tooltips.

xKey.description: The key to use to retrieve x-values from the data.

xName.description: A human-readable description of the x-values.

yKey.description: The key to use to retrieve y-values from the data.

yName.description: A human-readable description of the y-values.

meta.description: Configuration for histogram series.

binCount.description: The number of bins to try to split the x axis into. Clashes with the bins setting.

bins.description: Set the bins explicitly. The bins need not be of equal width. Clashes with the binCount setting.

aggregation.description: Dictates how the bins are aggregated. If set to 'sum', the value shown for the bins will be the total of the yKey values. If set to 'mean', it will display the average yKey value of the bin

areaPlot.description: For variable width bins, if true the histogram will represent the aggregated yKey values using the area of the bar. Otherwise, the height of the var represents the value as per a normal bar chart. This is useful for keeping an undistorted curve displayed when using variable-width bins

lineDash.description: Defines how the column strokes are rendered. Every number in the array specifies the length in pixels of alternating dashes and gaps. For example, [6, 3] means dashes with a length of 6 pixels with gaps between of 3 pixels.

lineDashOffset.description: The initial offset of the dashed line in pixels.

meta.description: Configuration for the highlighting used when the bars are hovered over.

fill.description: The fill colour of the bars when hovered over.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke around the bars when hovered over.

fill.description: The colour of the fill for the histogram bars.

fillOpacity.description: The opacity of the fill for the histogram bars.

stroke.description: The colour of the stroke for the histogram bars.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the stroke for the histogram bars.

strokeWidth.description: The width in pixels of the stroke for the histogram bars.

meta.description: A map of event names to event listeners.

nodeClick.description: The listener to call when a histogram bar is clicked.
